```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```


```{r}

life_exp <- read.csv("Life Expectancy Data.csv")
life_exp_filtered <- life_exp %>%
  filter(Population >= 30000000)

ggplot(life_exp_filtered, aes(x = LifeExpectancy, y = Country, color = Status)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_errorbarh(aes(xmin = LifeExpectancy - sd(LifeExpectancy),
                     xmax = LifeExpectancy + sd(LifeExpectancy))) +
  labs(x = "Life Expectancy", y = "Country", title = "Life Expectancy by Country with Standard Deviation") +
  theme_minimal()

```
